Name: Pizza Taxi Da Paolo & Seba
Review Text: True Italian restaurant, owner is a super friendly and cheerful napoletano! Pizza and pasta were both great! Price was also good so I‚Äôm definitely coming back to try the rest of the menu! Grazie mille Paolo!

Name: Pizza Taxi Da Paolo & Seba
Review Text: Fabulous food, very friendly staff. The owner who cooks for you is very friendly I loved the Italian vibe. I recommend visiting on Sunday, you will get the best service. Sorry for eating bruschetta so quick but it was too good. Thank you for a wonderful evening.

Name: Pizza Taxi Da Paolo & Seba
Review Text: My favorite Italian restaurant in Amsterdam. Products they cook with are excellent and therefore dishes delicious. Portion size/price ratio is generous, especially better than other non Italian trendy pizza places in Amsterdam. And the ‚Ä¶

Name: Pizza Taxi Da Paolo & Seba
Review Text: Amazing true Italian restaurant. You feel like you're in Italy when you are at this place. The owner is super friendly and is the one that prepare the pizza. Had a very nice experience with some friends! Planning to go again soon :)

Name: Pizza Taxi Da Paolo & Seba
Review Text:
I had a birthday dinner for 20 people in this cozy pizzeria and it was awesome!!
Very nice atmosphere, delicious food and caring hosts! They really make you feel welcome! Thank you!

Name: Pizza Taxi Da Paolo & Seba
Review Text: Really great place with amazingly delicious food and cozy environment. The staff including the chef/owner are incredibly friendly. Definitely a must visit place in Amsterdam if you‚Äôre craving Italian. And of course how can i forget the cat, Rocco. Cute warm little ball of fur. ‚ù§Ô∏è

Name: Pizza Taxi Da Paolo & Seba
Review Text: Very cheerful owner, friendly service. We ordered Napoletana, quite delicious. Gicecit a try if you like anchovies.

Name: Pizza Taxi Da Paolo & Seba
Review Text: Delicious pizza served with warmth and joy, in a no-frills cozy space

Name: Pizza Taxi Da Paolo & Seba
Review Text: Cozy restaurant where there's a relax vibe. The food is very good and the staff really nice. If you're a big running fan: the owner too! He run more than 30!!

Name: Pizza Taxi Da Paolo & Seba
Review Text: Very nice place. With some space, a relaxed atmosphere and good pizzas, with several good vegetarian opinions

Name: Pizza Taxi Da Paolo & Seba
Review Text: Great pizza and nice atmosphere. Pasta not as nice as the pizza but you can't have it all!

Name: Pizza Taxi Da Paolo & Seba
Review Text: Went there with my friend yesterday again!! Amazing Fresh handmade pizza and warm service. Thank you!!

Name: Pizza Taxi Da Paolo & Seba
Review Text: Great Atmosphere and amazing food. If you‚Äôre looking for an authentic Italian place, this is the one. I‚Äôll definitely go back.

Name: Pizza Taxi Da Paolo & Seba
Review Text: Visited on 21/2/19. Pizza was delicious, the best I've had outside of Italy. We ordered 2 pizzas and a salad and there was so much food at such good value for money. Service was also good and friendly. Our evening was rounded off nicely ‚Ä¶

Name: Pizza Taxi Da Paolo & Seba
Review Text: Still the best pizza in Amsterdam!!! We have been going there for over 10 years, must have tried every item on the menu and loved every evenings we spent at Paolo's. The place is fun,  laid back and the owner knows everybody... even if they visit for the first time. Just perfect!

Name: Pizza Taxi Da Paolo & Seba
Review Text: This place has a very nice atmosphere and every now and then there's a jazz performance (live!!). The staff is amazing (this includes the chef); super friendly and funny and serving the best pizza's! Will definitely come back.

Name: Pizza Taxi Da Paolo & Seba
Review Text:
My best place for a pizza when I'm in Amsterdam. Nothing to say more.
The pizzas are always perfectly cooked, not too many useless thing on them and that's what we like. The good taste of great ingredients. ‚Ä¶

Name: Pizza Taxi Da Paolo & Seba
Review Text: We ordered three pizzas from here - margherita, napoletana and bufalina - expecting good Neapolitan pizzas. All of them had Dutch cheese on them - the cheap industrial tosti kind. I can still taste it in my mouth and feel it repeating in my stomach. What self-respecting Italian puts Dutch cheese on a pizza?

Name: Pizza Taxi Da Paolo & Seba
Review Text: Excellent food and very welcoming owners. Olive oil and bread set the mark before the dishes arrived. Surprisingly good wine by the glass. Thin crispy pizza dough made by hand the old-fashioned way. Fantastic value for money! I still don't understand how come the place wasn't packed...

Name: Pizza Taxi Da Paolo & Seba
Review Text: The Italian standard was met and the stuff was really sweet. Finishing with limoncello is a must.

Name: Pizza Taxi Da Paolo & Seba
Review Text:
Good pizza, good location, nice staff :)
Not something amazing, but very standard

Name: Pizza Taxi Da Paolo & Seba
Review Text: I really enjoy eating at the restaurant. Lovely food and nice service! We always have a good time! The restaurant has an italian atmosphere! Paolo is always there for a nice talk and an special home made dish! Real Neapolitan evening! I recommend the pizza Taxi, the home made tiramisu and the good limoncello!

Name: Pizza Taxi Da Paolo & Seba
Review Text: Had an amazing evening here! Emailed them before arriving as we got a recommendation and I had no idea if I'll have something vegan to eat and Paolo answered immediately that he'll take care of me, and so he did. ‚Ä¶

Name: Pizza Taxi Da Paolo & Seba
Review Text: Paolo and his cuisine made our Sunday very lovely. We ordered Carpaccio, salad and pizza siciliana to share x 3 pax. The products were high quality along with Paolo‚Äôs company. The price is correct! We recommend this restaurant.

Name: Pizza Taxi Da Paolo & Seba
Review Text: Always great pizza and friendly service!  For dine in or take away pizza in de pijp, you gotta come here!

Name: Pizza Taxi Da Paolo & Seba
Review Text: Pizza was ok, nothing special. Gnocchi was over-heated in the  microwave and swimming in sauce. The restaurant  is overrated, we were expecting something much more unique considering the very high rating:(

Name: Pizza Taxi Da Paolo & Seba
Review Text: The owners have wide experience and it gives a taste of originality, since it's based in A'dam

Name: Pizza Taxi Da Paolo & Seba
Review Text: best pizza in Amsterdam!!!! If you want very good food and wonderful people this is the place! :D I forgot to say that pizza with burrata is the best pizza! (Absolutely suggested!!! (by an Italian!))

Name: Pizza Taxi Da Paolo & Seba
Review Text: It‚Äôs been for years a warm and comfortable place to meet my friends and have delicious Italian food. Unforgettable evenings. Recommend

Name: Pizza Taxi Da Paolo & Seba
Review Text: Service is amazing, typical Italian style! A real gem in AMS in that matter. Pizza reminds me of Napoli one, but could have a thinner crust and a better quality mozzarella!

Name: Pizza Taxi Da Paolo & Seba
Review Text: An awesome low key place! Quite good Italian pizza, made by a real Neapolitan, attentive and nice service, and also cheap!!

Name: Pizza Taxi Da Paolo & Seba
Review Text: Delicious pizza and friendly service

Name: Pizza Taxi Da Paolo & Seba
Review Text:
Its the best. We went there with 9 people and the did everything for us as we would have wanted. The pizza and paste are great. Great value for your money.

10/10

Name: Pizza Taxi Da Paolo & Seba
Review Text: Always tasty pizzas, friendly people, good prices and not too crowded. Very cute cat called Rocco :)

Name: Pizza Taxi Da Paolo & Seba
Review Text: Closest you gan get to real Italian pizza in Amsterdam. Plus, the cook is quite fun and they have a cat :D

Name: Pizza Taxi Da Paolo & Seba
Review Text: Fun and cozy atmosphere with a lovely little tiger. Not even a fan of peppers or mushrooms but or was the best part of their amazing pizza.

Name: Pizza Taxi Da Paolo & Seba
Review Text: Very tasty food and great service

Name: Pizza Taxi Da Paolo & Seba
Review Text: Loved it! Really nice authentic Roman place. We had the pizzas and some brucheta. Everything was tasty and really nice!

Name: Pizza Taxi Da Paolo & Seba
Review Text: Two visits and two exceptional feeds. Lovely pizzas and such a nice bunch of people running it. Always recommended!

Name: Pizza Taxi Da Paolo & Seba
Review Text: Awesome place, great vibes all the time! Pizza is very good and prices are fair.

Name: Pizza Taxi Da Paolo & Seba
Review Text: N.1 Pizza in Amsterdam ! Funny service and excellent location . The price is low. The experience is unique!

Name: Pizza Taxi Da Paolo & Seba
Review Text:
Wonderful ambience, 5 star service and delicious food.Ideal place to enjoy
very sweet and attentive staff.
Thank you.  I wish you all the best...

Name: Pizza Taxi Da Paolo & Seba
Review Text: One of the best pizza and pasta we‚Äòve ever had!
